name: Aetherium Capacity 1
description: Increase storage capacity for aetherium.

name: Aetherium Capacity 2
description: Increase storage capacity for aetherium.

name: Aetherium Capacity 3
description: Increase storage capacity for aetherium.

name: Aetherium Capacity 4
description: Increase storage capacity for aetherium.

name: Aetherium Capacity 5
description: Increase storage capacity for aetherium.

name: Aetherium Capacity 6
description: Increase storage capacity for aetherium.

name: Arena Brawling: Free-for-All Fighters
description: Add a free-for-all coordinator to the arena, allowing for teamless brawling.

name: Arena Brawling: Green Team
description: Add a green team coordinator to the arena, allowing for three-way team brawling.

name: Arena Brawling: Invulnerable Fighters
description: Add an invulnerability coordinator to the arena, allowing for brawling without taking damage.

name: Arena Restoration 1
description: Set up a temporary structure in your guild hall while construction begins on your guild hall's arena.

name: Arena Restoration 2
description: Complete the restoration of your arena and enable battling between red and blue team fighters.

name: Arena Ring-Out Barrier
description: Add an option for the obstacles coordinator to turn on a boundary around the brawling area to prevent ring-outs.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Chill Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that chill nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Cripple Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that cripple nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Fan Traps
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place fans that cyclically activate and push combatants back with strong gusts of wind.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Fear Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that apply fear to nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Flame Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that apply burning to nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Heal Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that heal nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Knockback Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that knock back nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Lava Floors
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place floor tiles that will kill players on contact.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Poison Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that poison nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Purple Torches
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place purple torches, which can be lit and unlit at will.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Strike Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that damage nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Team-Color Torches
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place torches in the red, blue, and green team colors. These torches can be lit and unlit at will.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Vortex Traps
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place traps that cyclically activate and pull in nearby players.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Walls
description: Add an obstacles coordinator to the arena, allowing players to enter the arena as a decorator and place walls.

name: Brawling Obstacle: Weakness Turrets
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place turrets that weaken nearby combatants.

name: Brawling Obstacle: White Torches
description: Allow decorators in the arena to place white torches, which can be lit and unlit at will.

name: Cloth Synthesizer 1
description: Add a cloth node to the workshop that randomly generates either jute or wool scraps when harvested.

name: Cloth Synthesizer 2
description: Add cotton scraps as a possible output from the workshop's cloth synthesizer.

name: Cloth Synthesizer 3
description: Add linen scraps as a possible output from the workshop's cloth synthesizer.

name: Cloth Synthesizer 4
description: Add silk scraps as a possible output from the workshop's cloth synthesizer.

name: Cloth Synthesizer 5
description: Add gossamer scraps as a possible output from the workshop's cloth synthesizer.

name: Deep Cave
description: The Deep Cave will expand your treasure trove by another 100 slots.

name: Expedition to Windswept Haven
description: Travel to the Windswept Haven entrance tunnel, located northwest of Garden of Seborhin in Vabbi. Meet Hashim and drive the Mordant Crescent out to claim this guild hall.

name: Expedition to the Gilded Hollow
description: Travel to the Gilded Hollow entrance tunnel, located beneath the golden city at the center of the Auric Basin. Meet Kogga inside the hollow and clear the Mordrem infestation there to claim this guild hall.

name: Expedition to the Lost Precipice
description: Travel to the sunken shrine that marks the hidden entrance to the Lost Precipice, in the northwest part of the Verdant Brink. Meet Sarah McKenzy inside the precipice, and clear the Mordrem infestation there to claim this guild hall.

name: Further Exploration
description: Open paths to the unexplored reaches of your guild hall.

name: General Merchant
description: Adds a merchant with harvesting and salvage tools to the guild's private locations.

name: Gilded Hollow
description: Your guild has claimed the Gilded Hollow and is holding it against recapture by the Elder Dragons.

name: Guild Anthems
description: Add a minstrel at the tavern who can set an anthem for your guild, which will play at moments of triumph.

name: Guild Armorer 1
description: Add a guild armorer to the market, from whom basic guild armor skins can be purchased.

name: Guild Armorer 2
description: Add jungle guild armor recipes to the guild armorer's inventory.

name: Guild Emblem Template
description: Allows guild members to create a permanent guild emblem design at the Guild Registrar for use on banners and other displays.

name: Guild Enhancement: Critical Crafting
description: Add a personal enhancement at the tavern that increases the chance of getting a critical success when crafting an item.

name: Guild Enhancement: Critical Harvesting
description: Add a personal enhancement at the tavern that increases the chance of getting a critical success when harvesting an item.

name: Guild Enhancement: Experience
description: Add a selectable personal enhancement at the tavern which will increase the rate of experience gain.

name: Guild Enhancement: Karma
description: Add a selectable personal enhancement at the tavern which will increases the rate of karma gain.

name: Guild Enhancement: Magic Find
description: Add a personal enhancement at the tavern that increases the chance of finding magic items.

name: Guild Enhancement: Map Bonus
description: Add a personal enhancement at the tavern that increases how often you get map bonuses.

name: Guild Enhancement: PvP Reward Boost
description: Add a personal enhancement at the tavern that increases the rate at which PvP reward tracks progress.

costs.name: Bowl of Black Pepper Cactus Salad

name: Guild Enhancement: World Experience
description: Add a personal enhancement at the tavern that increases the rate of WXP gain.

name: Guild Enhancement: World Reward Tracks
description: Add a personal enhancement at the tavern that increases the rate of WvW reward-track gain.

name: Guild Hall Decorations Merchant 1
description: Add a merchant to the market who sells basic decorations for your guild hall.

name: Guild Hall Decorations Merchant 2
description: Increase the inventory of your guild hall decorations merchant.

name: Guild Hall Decorations Merchant 3
description: Increase the inventory of your guild hall decorations merchant.

name: Guild Hall Monument Decorations
description: Add special decorations that can be inscribed with custom messages to the basic decorations merchant's inventory.

name: Guild Hall Music: City Themes
description: Visit the minstrel at the tavern to change the background music of your guild hall to a selection of themes based on the capitols of Tyria's major nations.

name: Guild Hall Music: Super Adventure Box
description: Visit the minstrel at the tavern to change the background music of your guild hall to a selection of themes based on Moto's Super Adventure Box.

name: Guild Hall Swiftness +11%
description: Permanently increase the run speed of guild members while in this guild hall by 11%.

name: Guild Hall Swiftness +22%
description: Permanently increase the run speed of guild members while in this guild hall by 22%.

name: Guild Hall Swiftness +33%
description: Permanently increase the run speed of guild members while in this guild hall by 33%.

name: Guild Initiative Registration
description: Access the Guild Initiative's central office in Lion's Arch.

name: Guild Miniature Merchant 1
description: Add a merchant to the market who sells miniatures emblazoned with your guild emblem.

name: Guild Miniature Merchant 2
description: Expand the inventory of the guild miniature merchant.

name: Guild Miniature Merchant 3
description: Expand the inventory of the guild miniature merchant.

name: Guild Portal
description: Add a portal device to the guild hall, allowing guild members to quickly travel as a group to missions and other destinations.

name: Guild Trader 1
description: Add a trader merchant to the market whose stock rotates daily. Guild members may purchase only one item each day.

name: Guild Trader 2
description: Expand the trader's inventory to include random crafting-related items.

name: Guild Trader 3
description: Guild members may now purchase 2 items from the guild trader per day.

name: Guild Trader 4
description: Expand the inventory of the guild trader to include guild hall decorations and related items.

name: Guild Trader 5
description: Guild members may now purchase 3 items from the guild trader per day.

name: Guild Treasure Trove
description: Gain access to a 100-slot guild vault.

name: Guild Vault: Stash
description: Grants access to a 50-slot guild vault and gold storage.

name: Guild Waypoint 10% Discount
description: Reduce the cost of using waypoints by 10% for all guild members.

name: Guild Waypoint 15% Discount
description: Reduce the cost of using waypoints by 15% for all guild members.

name: Guild Waypoint 5% Discount
description: Reduce the cost of using waypoints by 5% for all guild members.

name: Guild Weaponsmith 1
description: Add a guild weaponsmith to the market, selling a selection of guild weapon skins.

name: Guild Weaponsmith 2
description: Add recipes for chiaroscuro weapons to the guild weaponsmith's inventory.

name: Leather Synthesizer 1
description: Add a leather node to the workshop that randomly generates either rawhide or thin leather when harvested.

name: Leather Synthesizer 2
description: Add coarse leather as a possible output from the workshop's leather synthesizer.

name: Leather Synthesizer 3
description: Add rugged leather as a possible output from the workshop's leather synthesizer.

name: Leather Synthesizer 4
description: Add thick leather as a possible output from the workshop's leather synthesizer.

name: Leather Synthesizer 5
description: Add hardened leather as a possible output from the workshop's leather synthesizer.

name: Lost Precipice
description: Your guild has claimed the Lost Precipice and is holding it against recapture by the Elder Dragons.

name: Lumber Synthesizer 1
description: Add a lumber node to the workshop that randomly generates either green or soft logs when harvested.

name: Lumber Synthesizer 2
description: Add seasoned logs as a possible output from the workshop's lumber synthesizer.

name: Lumber Synthesizer 3
description: Add hard logs as a possible output from the workshop's lumber synthesizer.

name: Lumber Synthesizer 4
description: Add elder logs as a possible output from the workshop's lumber synthesizer.

name: Lumber Synthesizer 5
description: Add ancient logs as a possible output from the workshop's lumber synthesizer.

name: Market Restoration 1
description: Establish a temporary marketplace in your guild hall while construction begins on the foundation of the full plaza.

name: Market Restoration 2
description: Complete the restoration of your market.

name: Mine Excavation 1
description: Excavate the beginnings of a mine for your guild hall and begin mining aetherium out of the stone.

name: Mine Excavation 2
description: Expand your guild's mine.

name: Mine Excavation 3
description: Expand your guild's mine.

name: Mining Rate 1
description: Produce aetherium at a faster rate.

name: Mining Rate 2
description: Produce aetherium at a faster rate.

name: Mining Rate 3
description: Produce aetherium at a faster rate.

name: Mining Rate 4
description: Produce aetherium at a faster rate.

name: Mining Rate 5
description: Produce aetherium at a faster rate.

name: Mining Rate 6
description: Produce aetherium at a faster rate.

name: Mission Slot: PvE
description: Unlock a weekly mission slot that will only generate PvE-oriented missions and is unaffected by the guild's mission preference.

name: Mission Slot: PvP
description: Unlock a weekly mission slot that will only generate PvP-oriented missions and is unaffected by the guild's mission preference.

name: Mission Slot: WvW
description: Unlock a weekly mission slot that will only generate WvW missions and is unaffected by the guild's mission preference.

name: Objective Aura 1: Supply Capacity
description: The guild's claimed objectives now always emanate an aura that applies boons to allies in the vicinity while the guild holds the objective. Initially, the aura applies a +5 supply capacity.

name: Objective Aura 2: WvW Experience
description: Adds a 10% WvW experience bonus to the boons applied by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.

name: Objective Aura 3: Movement Speed
description: Adds a 25% movement speed bonus to the boons applied by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.

name: Objective Aura 4: Power
description: Adds a +100 power bonus to the boons applied by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.

name: Objective Aura 5: Precision
description: Adds a +100 precision bonus to the boons applied by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.

name: Objective Aura 6: Toughness
description: Adds a +100 toughness bonus to the boons applied by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.

name: Objective Aura 7: Vitality
description: Adds a +100 vitality bonus to the boons applied by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.

name: Objective Aura 8: Magic Find
description: Adds a 20% magic-find bonus to the boons applies by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.

name: Ore Synthesizer 1
description: Add an ore node to the workshop that randomly generates either copper or iron when mined.

name: Ore Synthesizer 2
description: Add silver as a possible output from the workshop's ore synthesizer.

name: Ore Synthesizer 3
description: Add gold as a possible output from the workshop's ore synthesizer.

name: Ore Synthesizer 4
description: Add platinum as a possible output from the workshop's ore synthesizer.

name: Ore Synthesizer 5
description: Add mithril as a possible output from the workshop's ore synthesizer.

name: Ore Synthesizer 6
description: Add orichalcum as a possible output from the workshop's ore synthesizer.

name: Plant Synthesizers 1
description: Add harvesting nodes to the workshop that randomly generate various vegetables, fruits, and herbs when harvested.

name: Plant Synthesizers 2
description: The workshop's plant synthesizers will now output more possible vegetables, fruits, and herbs.

name: Plant Synthesizers 3
description: The workshop's plant synthesizers will now output even more possible vegetables, fruits, and herbs.

name: Repair Anvil
description: Adds a repair anvil to the Guild Initiative Headquarters and the guild's hall, if they have one.

name: Schematic: Vault Transport
description: Craft schematics for manufacturing a remote access to the guild vault.

name: Scribing: Airship Defense
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 3 tactic that temporarily summons a group of airships to circle Stonemist Castle and bombard invaders while you claim it.

name: Scribing: Armored Dolyaks
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 1 improvement that significantly increases the defenses of dolyaks departing your guild's claimed supply camp.

name: Scribing: Assault Roller
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 2 tactic that summons a charr assault roller at your camp, which one of your guild members can transform into as a highly mobile siege weapon.

name: Scribing: Centaur Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 2 tactic that spawns a mobility banner at your guild's claimed objective. This banner may be picked up by one of your guild members and carried into battle, offering support to other members of your team in the area.

name: Scribing: Chilling Fog
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 2 tactic that temporarily summons a fog which chills invaders in the area of your claimed objective.

name: Scribing: Cloaking Waters
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 3 improvement that applies stealth to any ally who moves through the fountains at Stonemist Castle as long as it is claimed by your guild.

name: Scribing: Dragon Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 3 tactic that spawns an offensive banner at your guild's claimed objective. This banner may be picked up by one of your guild members and carried into battle, offering support to other members of your team in the area.

name: Scribing: Emergency Waypoint
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 3 tactic that temporarily summons a waypoint at your claimed objective, even during enemy attack.

name: Scribing: Guild Arrow Cart
description: Craft schematics to manufacture WvW arrowcarts that cost less supply to place.

name: Scribing: Guild Ballista
description: Craft schematics to manufacture WvW ballistae that cost less supply to place.

name: Scribing: Guild Banquet
description: Craft schematics to manufacture celebratory banquets that players can eat and drink from.

name: Scribing: Guild Catapult
description: Craft schematics to manufacture WvW catapults that cost less supply to place.

name: Scribing: Guild Experience Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies a 5% boost to experience gain for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Flame Ram
description: Craft schematics to manufacture WvW flame rams that cost less supply to place.

name: Scribing: Guild Gathering Bonus Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies a 10% boost to gathering chance for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Gathering and Swiftness Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies a 15% boost to gathering chance and a 10% boost to swiftness for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Gold and Magic Find Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies a 10% boost to gold gain and a 15% boost to magic find for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Gold from Kills Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies a 5% boost to gold gain from monster kills for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Heroes Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies boosts to karma, experience, gold gain, gathering chance, magic find, and run speed for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Karma Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture guild banners that offer allies a 5% boost to karma gain for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Karma and Experience Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies a 10% boost to experience and karma gain for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Magic Find Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies a 10% boost to magic find for 30 minutes.

name: Scribing: Guild Road Marker
description: Craft schematics to manufacture banners that offer allies swiftness for 20 seconds.

name: Scribing: Guild Shield Generator
description: Craft schematics to manufacture WvW shield generators that cost less supply to place.

name: Scribing: Guild Siege Golem
description: Craft schematics to manufacture WvW siege golems that cost less supply to build.

name: Scribing: Guild Trebuchet
description: Craft schematics to manufacture WvW trebuchets that cost less supply to place.

name: Scribing: Guild World Events
description: Allows your guild to build consumables that can be used to activate various world events.

name: Scribing: Hardened Gates
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 2 improvement that significantly increases the defenses of gates at your guild's claimed objective.

name: Scribing: Hardened Siege
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 1 improvement that increases the defenses of existing siege installations at your guild's claimed objective.

name: Scribing: Invincible Dolyak
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 1 tactic that sends an invulnerable supply dolyak from a claimed camp.

name: Scribing: Invulnerable Fortifications
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 2 tactic that temporarily makes the walls and gate of your claimed objective impervious to enemy attack.

name: Scribing: Iron Guards
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 2 improvement that significantly increases the defenses of guards at your guild's claimed objective.

name: Scribing: Minor Supply Drop
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 1 tactic that refills the supply cache at your guild's claimed objective.

name: Scribing: Packed Dolyaks
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 2 improvement that increases the amount of supply carried by dolyaks departing from your guild's claimed supply camp.

name: Scribing: Presence of the Keep
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 3 improvement that doubles the effect of your guild's auras at your guild's claimed keep.

name: Scribing: Sabotage Depot
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 1 improvement that rigs the supply depot at your guild's claimed objective to explode if your objective is captured by enemies, destroying all of the supply there.

name: Scribing: Speedy Dolyaks
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 2 improvement that significantly increases the speed of dolyaks departing from your guild's claimed supply camp.

name: Scribing: Turret Gates
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 3 improvement that causes the gates at your guild's claimed objective to actively attack invaders.

name: Scribing: Turtle Banner
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 1 tactic that spawns a defensive banner at your guild's claimed objective. This banner may be picked up by one of your guild members and carried into battle, offering support to other members of your team in the area.

name: Scribing: Watchtower
description: Craft schematics to manufacture a tier 3 improvement that reveals enemies in the region of your guild's claimed tower on your map.

name: Super Guild Anthem
description: Add a minstrel at the tavern who can set an anthem for your guild, which will play at moments of triumph.

name: Synthesis Output 1
description: Increase the efficiency of the guild's ore and lumber synthesizers, increasing daily harvesting opportunities to 4 each.

name: Synthesis Output 2
description: Increase the efficiency of the guild's synthesizers, increasing daily ore and lumber harvests to 6 each and plant, leather, and cloth harvests to 2 each.

name: Synthesis Output 3
description: Increase the efficiency of the guild's synthesizers, increasing daily ore and lumber harvests to 8 each.

name: Synthesis Output 4
description: Increase the efficiency of the guild's synthesizers, increasing daily ore and lumber harvests to 10 each and plant, leather, and cloth harvests to 3 each.

name: Tavern Restoration 1
description: Allow access to this proprietor's upgrades and set up a temporary structure in the guild hall while work begins on restoring your full tavern.

name: Tavern Restoration 2
description: Complete the restoration of your tavern.

name: War Room Restoration 1
description: Begin restoring your war room.

name: War Room Restoration 2
description: Complete the restoration of your war room.

name: Windswept Haven
description: Your guild has claimed Windswept Haven and is holding it against recapture by the Mordant Crescent.

name: Workshop Restoration 1
description: Begin restoring your workshop.

name: Workshop Restoration 2
description: Complete the restoration of your workshop.

name: WvW Guild Claiming: Camps
description: Allow guild members with the proper permissions to claim a supply camp for the guild, allowing it to gain access to upgrades over time.

name: WvW Guild Claiming: Keeps
description: Allow guild members with the proper permissions to claim a keep for the guild, allowing it to gain access to upgrades over time.

name: WvW Guild Claiming: Stonemist Castle
description: Allow guild members with the proper permissions to claim Stonemist Castle for the guild, allowing it to gain access to upgrades over time.

name: WvW Guild Claiming: Towers
description: Allow guild members with the proper permissions to claim a tower for the guild, allowing it to gain access to upgrades over time.
